Function Documentation
getAIDeviceHandler() getAIDeviceHandlerAppDataInterce.c AppDataInterce.cgetAIDeviceHandler
uint16_t * getAIDeviceHandler (void )
Retrieve the device handlers for AI (Analog Input) modules.
This API returns an array of handlers for AI modules. The first element in the array (index 0) contains the total number of handlers. The subsequent elements (index 1 to N) represent the actual handlers.
Parameters
void
Returns
uint16_t* A pointer to an array of handlers for AI modules.
Index 0: Number of handlers.
Index 1 to Index (N): DI module handlers.
Note
The maximum size of the array is 9, where index 0 contains the count of handlers.
Here is the caller graph for this function:

getAnalogModIdentificationInfo() getAnalogModIdentificationInfoAppDataInterce.c AppDataInterce.cgetAnalogModIdentificationInfo
uint8_t getAnalogModIdentificationInfo (uint16_t analog_module_handler, s_io_identification_info * identification_info)
Retrieves the identification info of the requested analog module.
Parameters
inanalog_module_handler
Device handler of the analog module [AI, AO, AIO].
outidentification_info
Pointer to the s_io_identification_info structure to store identification details.
Returns
RET_OK on success.
Error code on failure.
Note
Refer to error_code_t for possible error codes.

getDevicePosition() getDevicePositionAppDataInterce.c AppDataInterce.cgetDevicePosition
uint8_t getDevicePosition (uint16_t device_handler)
Retrieves the position of a specified device.
This function returns the position of the device, which can be one of the following: MBN, IO modules, ISEM_DIAG, DIAG_VALVE, STANDARD_VALVE, Internal Prop and External Prop.
Parameters
indevice_handler
The handler for the device whose position is required.
Returns
Returns the position of the device.
Here is the caller graph for this function:

uint16_t * getDiagValveHandler (uint16_t pressurezone_handler)
Retrieve the device handlers for Diag Valve .
This API returns an array of handlers for Diag Valve. in the array (index 0) contains the total number of handlers. The subsequent elements (index 1 to N) represent the actual handlers.
Parameters
void
Returns
uint16_t* A pointer to an array of handlers for Diag Valve.
Index 0: Number of handlers.
Index 1 to Index (N): Diag Valve module handlers.
Note
The maximum size of the array is MAX_DIAG_VALVE_PER_PZZONE +1, where index 0 contains the count of handlers.

getDiscoveryDetails() getDiscoveryDetailsAppDataInterce.c AppDataInterce.cgetDiscoveryDetails
uint8_t getDiscoveryDetails (s_discovery_details * discovery_detail)
Retrieve the discovery details of the modules.
Parameters
outdiscovery_detail
Pointer to a structure where the discovery details will be stored.
Returns
RET_OK on success.
RET_ERROR on failure
Note
The s_discovery_details structure will include the product name and the counts of various module types (DI, DO, DIO, AI, AO, AIO, Pressure Zones, PropZones).

Here is the caller graph for this function:

getPressureZoneDeviceCountDetails() getPressureZoneDeviceCountDetailsAppDataInterce.c AppDataInterce.cgetPressureZoneDeviceCountDetails
uint8_t getPressureZoneDeviceCountDetails (uint16_t pressurezone_handler, s_prszone_device_count_details * pressurezone_device_count)
Retrieves the device count from the specified pressure zone.
This function fetches the number of devices present in a given pressure zone, including ISEM DIAG, Standard Valve, Diag Valve, and Internal Prop
Parameters
inpressurezone_handler
The handler for the specific pressure zone.
outpressurezone_device_count
Pointer to a structure where the device count details will be stored.
Returns
Returns RET_OK on success, or an error code on failure. Refer to error_code_t for possible error codes.
Here is the caller graph for this function:

uint16_t * getPressureZoneHandler (void )
Retrieve the pressure zone handlers.
This API returns an array of pressure zone handlers. The first element in the array (index 0) contains the total number of handlers. The subsequent elements (index 1 to N) represent the actual handlers.
Parameters
void
Returns
uint16_t* A pointer to an array of handlers for the pressure zone.
Index 0: Number of handlers.
Index 1 to Index (N): Pressure Zone handlers.
Note
The maximum size of the array is 6, where index 0 contains the count of handlers.
